channel.title: UT2004 Discussion
channel.description: Talk about anything related to UT/UT2003.

item.title: looking for a gun mod

item.content:encoded:
hey im looking for a paintball gun mod where all the stock guns that the game comes with, are changed to different paintball guns..

this is for unreal tournament 1

item.title: Does anyone have SmashDroids still?
item.author: invalid@example.com (JohnnySix)
item.dc:creator: JohnnySix
item.content:encoded:
It was a fairly early mod, and nothing has been done on it since 2001.

The downloads on the site are all 404's now and I'd love to give it a go.

The site is : http://www.planetunreal.com/smashdroids/


If anyone has this lurking away in some CD/HD archive of old UT mods, I'd be eternally grateful to you if you could pass it on.

Cheers

John

item.title: Great MODS...no servers....
item.author: invalid@example.com (QuickBeam)
item.dc:creator: QuickBeam
item.content:encoded:
Troopers...1 server....UnWheel...3 servers...AirBucs....3-4servers etc,etc,

Im thinking this is due to the newness and polishing being and been done for the EC edition(just out btw). So im hoping the community will get out of hibernation and play these great mods.

I like ONS like everyone else but cmon people...these mods are deserving some more recognition...

Just venting guys!!!!!Hope to get fragged by some real people soon

item.title: UT2k3->UT2k4?
item.author: invalid@example.com (q_mi_4_3)
item.dc:creator: q_mi_4_3
item.content:encoded: I want to know if most skins and mutators(weapon ones and others) will work from 2k3 to 2k4 without porting.

item.title: Where's some good railguns when you need them?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sleepy_the_Jackal)
item.dc:creator: Sleepy_the_Jackal
item.content:encoded:
I am a big fan of weapons of mass fragging, especially railguns. I was wondering if any of you could help me find some really cool ones for use in UT2003. I've already tried my luck with a few serch engines and came up with the one from the Chaos Dreams mod. Don't get me wrong, it's a great gun, but I always liked ones that appeared very menacing and high tech, rather than compact and practical. If anybody knows of some really badass railguns, please be sure to let me know.
Thanks in...

Where's some good railguns when you need them?

item.title: Troopers Release 2 patch
item.author: invalid@example.com (Yoshiro)
item.dc:creator: Yoshiro
item.content:encoded:
Just thought I"d give you guys a heads up, the patch that fixes up release 2 and adds another Obj level OBJ- StarDestroyer is OUT!

Troopers Page or visit at #ut2003troopers on gamesnet in IRC. Expect it within the next couple of days.


www.lucasfiles.com


Other links are also starting to come up so look around!

-edit-
This post has been edited to reflect the nature of Troopers and that its out.

item.title: Help - Mod Tutorial needed
item.author: invalid@example.com (evaderdjo)
item.dc:creator: evaderdjo
item.content:encoded:
Hello. I am completely new to the Mod development process. I have been fooling around with the old UT engine making short films, but now I have the bug to create my own game using UT2003. I have enough experience to import models, textures and build maps. What I lack is the know-how to create an actual game, so I am looking for some kind of tutorial.

These are the kinds of things I am looking for.
1) Is there a way to have my game to fire up from a shortcut, using the UT2003 engine,...

Help - Mod Tutorial needed

item.title: UT2k4 Onslaught
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pxtl)
item.dc:creator: Pxtl
item.content:encoded:
From the horse's mouth:

# ONSLAUGHT Onslaught is a large scale, team and vehicle based game mode in which players battle for control of huge exterior settings. Since these settings are so large one naturally needs a way to traverse these distances, hence there are a variety of vehicles that can be used in Onslaught. These vehicles are built to not only move but also destroy your foes.

Each team has their own vehicles and you cannot steal your foes vehicles unless they unlock them by...

UT2k4 Onslaught

item.title: Help!! Yaarg!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Morter)
item.dc:creator: Morter
item.content:encoded: I don't know how, but all of a sudden, my regular CTF has been plagued...with...SOMETHING! I have *MANDITORY* Matrix moves. Plus when i fire or altfire while holding the flag, I DROP IT! >_< I have tried disabling all mutators, and its still all...plagued. Someone help me! Whats wrong and how do I fix it?

item.title: TacticalOps Weapons in UT
item.author: invalid@example.com (Operandi)
item.dc:creator: Operandi
item.content:encoded:
What I’m looking for is a way to use the weapons from Tactical Ops in normal UT. In other words play CTF or DM with TO weapons through UT rather then playing them through the TO mod.

I tried both StuffSwapper and WORM but neither seemed to be able see the TO weapons, am I doing somthing wrong?
